name: Phantasmat: Curse of the Mist Collector's Edition
name_original: Phantasmat: Curse of the Mist Collector's Edition
description:
Phantasmat: Curse of the Mist Collector's Edition is a casual adventure game developed by Eipix Entertainment. It was originally released in 2017. Big Fish Games published the game. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
Phantasmat: Curse of the Mist Collector's Edition is available on PC.
